article.title: A Study of Information Requests for Scientific Research and Design
article.author: Malyarenko, D.P.
article.text: This paper describes methods of studying information requests on source information, analyzes results of questionnaire distribution. On the basis of the questionnaire answers a card file of the subject requests and list of requests on source information was formed. Since the study these requests determines the content and purpose of the information process, the author suggests that the study of requests be the first phase of information process.
